strings.drefFormCoordinationMechanism: Are there major coordination mechanisms in place?
strings.drefFormCoordinationMechanismDescription: List coordination mechanisms/platform in place at local/district and national level. Indicate the lead authorities/agencies. How the National Society is involved/positioned in this coordination. Does the NS in any lead/co-lead role? Any identified gap/overlap in the coordination (e.g., sector missingâ€¦)?
strings.drefFormDidNationalSocietyStartedImminen: Did the National Society started any anticipatory actions?
strings.drefFormDidNationalSocietyStartedSlow: Has the National Society started any actions?
strings.drefFormGapsInAssessment: Any identified gaps/limitations in the assessment
strings.drefFormIcrcDescription: Presence or not of ICRC in country, and support directly provided for this emergency response. Other programs and support provided outside of the scope of this emergency should not be indicated here.
strings.drefFormIfrcDescription: Presence or not of IFRC in country (if not, indicate the cluster covering), support provided for this response, domestic coordination, technical, strategic, surge. Explain what support provided in terms of Secretariat services: PMER, Finance, Admin, HR, Security, logistics, NSD.
strings.ifrcNetworkActionsHeading: IFRC Network Actions Related To The Current Event
strings.icrcActionsHeading: ICRC Actions Related To The Current Event
strings.drefFormNationalOtherActors: Other Actors Actions Related To The Current Event
strings.drefFormNationalSocietiesActionsDescript: Please indicate a description of the ongoing response with if possible: Branches involved, number of volunteers/staff involved in actions, assets deployed/distributed, number of people reach. Impact/added value of the NS in the response already ongoing.
strings.drefFormNsResponseStarted: Start date of National Society actions
strings.drefFormPartnerNationalSocietyDescriptio: Briefly set out which PNS are present and give details of PNS contributions/roles on the ground and remotely for this specific operation
